aboutme:
As a frontend engineer at Google & HCL, I leverage my seven years of experience and my IT degree from Universidad Tecnológica Fidel Velázquez to create innovative and user-centric web solutions that integrate with existing systems and APIs. I have a passion for problem-solving, collaboration, and proactive code management, which enable me to deliver high-impact technical solutions for various projects and clients. 

One of my recent achievements was orchestrating the development and integration of value-enhancing features for a high-stakes B2B portal generating $100M in annual sales at Fender Musical Instruments Corporation. I used Angular to craft a seamless user experience and contribute to revenue growth. I also consistently delivered quality web applications utilizing modern web technologies and dynamic data integration via APIs at HCLTech. My goal is to continue learning and growing as a frontend engineer, and get experience as a fullstack developer with NestJS.

basicInfo.name: Software Engineer focused on solve business problems through web technologies

summary:
Analysis, develop and integrate new features, improve and fix issu requested by 
Bussines team for B2B portal, integrating the frontend with the backend with 
asyncronoius technique throught of an API.

Support and collaboration with B2B team to review issues, improves and new 
features that will to be do for the B2B project

SCRUM daily meeting report with B2B team for review current tasks, blockers or 
pending things to improves the Web Portal

Create and execute Unit Testing code for solutions integrated in new or exists 
components using Jasmine framework

Analysis, develop and integrate new features for sales and distribution of the 
videogames for mobile devices throught websites in collaboration with the best 
cellphone operators at Chile and Peru.

Make improvements and fix issues for LATAM websites reported by Project 
Manager, QA or Business team for get to up 98% of performance.

SCRUM daily meeting report with the Project Manager for reviewcurrent tasks, 
to-do, blockers or pending things to improves LATAM websites assigned.

Analysis and create a report about the user's traffic to Project Manager within 
LATAM websites asigned.

Participate in all SDLC focused to custom software usign Kanban tasks, assigned 
from Developer Lead for client requirements improving them logic busniess to 
up 30%.

Schedule, visit, track and report to Developer Lead about helpdesk to client 
request for computer equipment issue or maintenance physical network with 
On Demand schema

Kanban report meeting with Developer Lead about helpdesk and development 
to-do tasks in the next week.

projects.name: Kanban Dashboard
projects.description: A trello-like application. For this implementation I did use Angular 17 and Gary-CSS as layout framework. NGRX (Redux) like a Pattern Design, furthermore of use Local storage so save data in a browser storage.

projects.name: Rick and Morty Searcher
projects.description: Using a Reactive Input, get and show Characters of Rick And Morty series like results, taking the value of the Reactive Input. For this challenge I did use Angular 16 and Gary CSS as layout framework, furthermore of use Rick and Morty API.

projects.name: Github Issues Searcher
projects.description: Using a Reactive Input, get and show Issues like results from Github taking as key word: username, repository or pull request. For this implementation I did use Angular 17 and Ng Bootstrap as layout framework. NGRX (Redux) like a Pattern Design, furthermore of use Github Search API.

projects.name: SWAPI Challenge
projects.description: About this challenge: get and show StarWars films. Each film show the characters that appears in the film. For this challenge I did use: Angular 11 with Angular Material and GaryCss as layout framework, furthermore of use Star Wars API.

projects.name: SpaceX Missions
projects.description: About this challenge: get and show all launches of SpaceX. Each launch is displays with their details in another page. For this challenge I did use: ReactJS with Bulma as layout framework, furthermore of use SpaceX API.
